General.Name: Primarius Technologies Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Primarius Technologies Co., Ltd. researches, designs, and develops EDA tools in China. It is involved in the device modelling and circuit simulation, as well as integrated circuit manufacturing and design activities. The company also provides semiconductor parameter testing solutions. It serves foundries, design houses, and IDMs. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China.
